input_action.name: HoldToAdjustFrameFrequencyInUI
input_action.display_name: Hold To Adjust Game Speed Style

input_action.name: IncreaseFrameSize
input_action.description: Fast forward the entire simulation. Makes the clock run faster, events happen faster, and everything -- it's literally a fast forward function in every sense of the word. Won't cause extra CPU load, either!

input_action.name: DecreaseFrameSize
input_action.description: Slow the entire simulation down. Makes the clock run slower, events happen slower, and everything -- it's literally running the game in slow-motion, so it won't cause a shift to balance like changing the game speed styles.

input_action.name: IncreaseFrameFrequency
input_action.description: Ship movement speeds and attack powers get progressively higher the more times you press this. Leads to faster battles and the need to be a faster clicker. Does inherently have an impact on balance.

input_action.name: DecreaseFrameFrequency
input_action.description: Ship movement speeds and attack powers get progressively slower the more times you press this. Leads to more contemplative battles and less rush. Does inherently have an impact on balance.

input_action.name: ShowShipRanges_All
input_action.description: Show the attack ranges of all weapons of all ships on this planet.

input_action.name: ShowShipRanges_Selected
input_action.description: Show the attack ranges of all weapons of all ships you have selected on this planet.

input_action.name: ShowShipRanges_Hovered
input_action.display_name: Show Ship Ranges (Ship Hovered Over Only)
input_action.description: Show the attack ranges of all weapons of whatever ship you're hovering over.

input_action.name: ShowShipOrders
input_action.description: Show lines that indicate what the movement orders are for any ships you have selected.

input_action.name: MakePlanetClickSelectAndSwitchView
input_action.display_name: Make It So Clicking A Planet Selects And Switches Your View
input_action.description: Normally when you left-click a planet on the galaxy map the game selects that planet, but does not immediately switch to planet view. Holding this keybind will make it not only select the planet, but also 'switch to planet view' in one step for you.

input_action.name: ShowPlanetNamesOnSinglePlanet
input_action.description: Show the names of planets on the single-planet view.

input_action.name: ShowPlanetNamesOnGalaxyMap
input_action.description: Show all the names of planets on the galaxy map view.
